headline: NRC Greenlights Constellation’s $167 Million Digital Modernization Plan for Limerick Clean Energy Center; State-of-the-Art Technology Upgrades Will Enhance Reliability, Diagnostic Capability and Cyber Resilience
summary: BALTIMORE, January 06, 2026--Constellation announced the NRC has approved a License Amendment Request for the Limerick Clean Energy Center’s Digital Modernization Project.

raw.headline: NRC Greenlights Constellation’s $167 Million Digital Modernization Plan for Limerick Clean Energy Center; State-of-the-Art Technology Upgrades Will Enhance Reliability, Diagnostic Capability and Cyber Resilience
raw.summary: BALTIMORE, January 06, 2026--Constellation announced the NRC has approved a License Amendment Request for the Limerick Clean Energy Center’s Digital Modernization Project.

headline: S&P 500 Giant Vistra Follows Competitor Constellation Energy's Lead With $4 Billion Natural Gas Bet
summary: Vistra agreed on Monday to a $4 billion deal for 5.5 gigawatts of natural gas-fired power generation.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Giant Vistra Follows Competitor Constellation Energy's Lead With $4 Billion Natural Gas Bet
raw.summary: Vistra agreed on Monday to a $4 billion deal for 5.5 gigawatts of natural gas-fired power generation.

headline: Why Constellation Energy Stock Slumped Today
summary: The recently enlarged company is making a move to adjust its balance sheet.

raw.headline: Why Constellation Energy Stock Slumped Today
raw.summary: The recently enlarged company is making a move to adjust its balance sheet.
